solution_line_template: She spent ${doll_price} on her younger sister because {dolls_bought} x {doll_price} = <<{dolls_bought}*{doll_price}={spent_on_younger}>>{spent_on_younger}
She buys {lego_sets_bought} lego sets for her older sister because {spent_on_younger} / {lego_price} = <<{spent_on_younger}/{lego_price}={lego_sets_bought}>>{lego_sets_bought}
